thread.title: Desiigner Confirms adidas Collaboration While Sneaker Shopping
thread.title_full: Desiigner Confirms adidas Collaboration While Sneaker Shopping

author: Chris Danforth
title: Desiigner Confirms adidas Collaboration While Sneaker Shopping
text:
Subscribe to Highsnobiety on YouTube 
The next up in Complex ‘s ongoing sneaker shopping series is none other than Desiigner. 
The energetic Brooklyn emcee hits the shelves at Flight Club in Los Angeles, sharing his thoughts on his sneaker tastes, growing up on Jordans, and even confirming for the first time that his very own sneaker with adidas is on the way. 
Although we’re not overly surprised, given that Desiigner’s mentors Pusha T and Kanye West have both put pen to paper with the Three Stripes, the announcement is still exciting for sneakerheads and hip-hop fans alike. 
In the end, Desiigner checks out with two pairs of adidas, and one pair of Jordans. To see what he copped, peep the video above. 
Now, dive into some highlights from Highsnobiety ‘s YouTube channel.
